Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Adjuvant/Anti-glaucoma Agent/Latanoprost,/NCIThesaurus/Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Physiology-Regulatory Factor/Eicosanoid/Prostaglandin Compound/Latanoprost
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A prostaglandin F2alpha analogue and a prostanoid selective FP receptor agonist with an ocular hypertensive effect. Latanoprost increases uveoscleral outflow and thereby reduces intraocular pressure.
